entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS

SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
